chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), dart -> inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> ~ expf (L m one x y) x y_1

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
expf_not_orbit_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> expf m z t -> expf (L m one x y) z t
expf_L1_II_CNA : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> ~ expf m x z -> expf m z t
expf_L1_II_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> betweenf m x z y0 /\ betweenf m x t y0 \/ betweenf m y_1 z x10 /\ betweenf m y_1 t x10 \/ ~ expf m x z /\ expf m z t -> expf (L m one x y) z t
expf_L1_I_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in ~ expf m x y0 -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0
expf_L1_I_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0 -> expf (L m one x y) z t
expf_not_orbit_x_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> expf (L m one x y) z t
degree_L1_split : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> expf m x y0 -> MF.degree m x = MF.degree m1 x + MF.degree m1 y_1
expf_expf_L0_3_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
cF_L1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) dx x = y_1
expf_L1_II_CNA_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let m2 := L m one x y in let t := Iter (cF m2) i z in inv_hmap m2 -> exd m z -> expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> expf m z t
expf_expf_L0_4_bis_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m y_0_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
expf_y0_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m y0 y_1
expf_expf_L0_4_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m y z -> expf (L m zero x y) y z
expf_expf_L0_2_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_6 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y t -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
not_expf_expf_L0_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf (L m zero x y) y x0
expf_not_expf_L0_CV : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in expf (L m zero x y) y x0 -> ~ expf m x_1 y
expf_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
diff_y_1_y0_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy_1 := MF.degree m y_1 in ~ expf m x y0 -> j <= dy_1 - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + j) x <> x
cF_L1_x10_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> j < dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx - (j + 1)) y_1 = y_1
between_expf_L0_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
degree_y0_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in MF.degree m y0 = MF.degree m y_1
cF_L1_y_1_y0_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy_1 := MF.degree m y_1 in ~ expf m x y0 -> j <= dy_1 - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + j) x = Iter (cF m) j y_1
expf_L0_5 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z /\ expf m y t \/ expf m x_1 t /\ expf m y z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_5bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z /\ expf m x_1 t \/ expf m y z /\ expf m y t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_not_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in expf m x_1 y < -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) y x0
not_expf_L1_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> ~ expf m1 x z
diff_cF_L1_y_1_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> j + 1 + i <= dx - 1 -> 0 < i -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 <> y_1
degree_L1_merge_x_others : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> MF.degree m1 z = MF.degree m z

```coq
unfold not; intros.
rewrite expf_not_orbit_x in H.
destruct H as [Hinv [Hexp Hexp']].
rewrite degree_L1_split in Hexp'.
destruct Hexp' as [Hexp'' Hexp''' ].
rewrite expf_L1_I_CN in Hexp'''.
destruct Hexp''' as [Hexp'''' | Hexp'''].
- apply not_expf_expf_L0_CN in Hexp'''; rewrite Hexp'''; auto.
- apply not_expf_L1_x in H; rewrite H; auto.
Qed.```

original: unfold not; intros. rewrite expf_not_orbit_x in H. destruct H as [Hinv [Hexp Hexp']]. rewrite degree_L1_split in Hexp'. destruct Hexp' as [Hexp'' Hexp ]. rewrite expf_L1_I_CN in Hexp. destruct Hexp as [Hexp' | Hexp]. - apply not_expf_expf_L0_CN in Hexp; rewrite Hexp; auto. - apply not_expf_L1_x in H; rewrite H; auto.
